root.title: ge ge say amr amr order worth 650 mln dlr
root.body: gener electr co say amr corp oprder ge cfg 80c2 engin power 25 new airbu industri a300 600r 15 boe co ba 767 300er twinjet worth 650 mln dlr compani say order large singl one ever receiv commerci aircraft engin amr announc order earlier today ge say deliveri start earli 1988
